thread.title: Is it time to pack your bags for Cuba? (Video)
thread.title_full: Is it time to pack your bags for Cuba? (Video)

author: Mark Harden
title: Is it time to pack your bags for Cuba? (Video)
text:
See All Homes of the Day The easing of relations between the United States and Cuba may have some Americans dreaming of days on the beach and Havana nights — but is that realistic? Cuba already is a "huge, huge" market four tourism, with some 2 million visitors last year, says CheapCaribbean.com CEO Steve Dumaine . But most of those travelers came from Europe and Canada — places with better relations to the island nation than America has had the last half-century. Still, companies like Apple Vacations are getting in on the Cuba-travel market, and others may follow suit. • In the Bloomberg video above, Dumaine talks about the prospects for travel to Cuba.
